column2: select top # c.*--ci.*, c.ORDINAL_POSITION, c.column_name as realname from metadata.columninfo ci join information_schema.columns c on c.column_name = ci.column_name+#+cast (ci.id as varchar (#) ) and ci.table_name = c.table_name and c.schema_name = # order by c.table_name, c.ORDINAL_POSITION
